title: Ma' Barker: A Doting Mother And Gangster Overlord
itunes:title: Ma' Barker: A Doting Mother And Gangster Overlord
description:
In Episode 93, Robert is joined by Emily Yoshida (Night Call Podcast) to discuss Ma Barker, the notorious leader of the Barker Gang.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Barker/Karpis Gang
  2. The day 'Ma' Barker was slain in Florida
  3. TOWN WHERE MA BARKER DIED SURE THAT ALLIGATOR DID HER IN
  4. O'Connor Layover Agreement
  5. Crooks’ haven: The gangster era in St. Paul
  6. ‘Pretty Boy’ Falls
  7. Pretty Boy Floyd's Life, Crimes Retold
  8. Ma Barker: America's Most Wanted Mother
  9. The Terrible Rise (and Subsequent Spectacular Fall) of the Barker/Karpis Gang

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
